    public static final java.lang.String GET_ENROLLED_STUDENTS "select course.courseId,course.courseName,semesterregistration.studentId,semesterregistration.semester from course inner join semesterregistration on course.courseId = semesterregistration.courseId where course.instructorId = ? order by course.courseId"
